Yggdrasil nodded wearily. It seemed he was created to support other
and to absorb problems.

Yggdrasil: I understand that, Kup. The problem is that Preds would
probably "booby-trap" her so that we can't reprogram her without
hurting her... or even us. We'll need Kenzo's advice on that.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Kup/ELita:
> 
> Elita was almot sleep, and Kup continued rock her while he arrived 
> to Conforence Room. "Kenzo, we're in Confecence room" said the Male 
> by com link"Hello Commander Ydrassil. "After a while Kup said" It's 
> about Nightlight, A voulunteer had offered to rescue her... but the 
> true problem would be when she is here... You hear what said that 
> Pred.... Might be dificult reprograme her back, Windlord said if we 
> should lock her up while we get it but the dilema is: she isn't 
> guilty of her reprogramation and keep her in acell may do that 
> Rodimus and problaby Nightlight suffer more, but in other hand we 
> can't let her be free in the base... If that scum is telling the 
> true, she will see us like an enemie and like that, she can attack 
> us..."
> 
> Elita yawed and fell sleep, Kup saw her and added "I really don't 
> know what could we do, Commander, but as Chief of security, I have 
> to be sure that nobody 'cause troubles here..."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > Yggdrasil replied on his comm unit.
> > 
> > Yggdrasil: Sure. Let's go in the conference room.
